section_title: APPROACHES TO ADDRESS LOSS AND DAMAGE:
sentences: On this issue (FCCC/SBI/2011/3 and MISC.1), Tonga, for AOSIS, called for a decision at COP 17 on activities under the work programme on loss and damage and agreement on the goal of establishing an international mechanism on loss and damage at COP 18.
Mark Berman (Canada) and a co-chair yet to be identified will co-chair a contact group .
